A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi disappointed me on so many levels. The humor felt forced and many of the key plot points from TFA were completely tossed out the window. When I initially left the theater\, I was happy with what I saw\, then reality hit when I started to realize that the story was a broken mess.\n\nSad to say\, but I have no excitement or feelings of anticipation for 9. Just gonna hope that things are improved with the next installment.
